getAdmin().details: gives the current administrator of this contract.

returns._0: the current administrator of this contract.

params._buyer: The address of the starterPack purchaser
params._queueId: The ID of the nonce queue for the given address. The default is queueID=0, and the max is queueID=2**128-1

isMetaTransactionProcessor(address).details: check whether address `who` is given meta-transaction execution rights.

returns._0: whether the address has meta-transaction execution rights.

params.buyer: The address paying for the purchase & receiving tokens
params.catalystIds: The catalyst IDs to be purchased
params.catalystQuantities: The quantities of the catalysts to be purchased
params.gemIds: The gem IDs to be purchased
params.gemQuantities: The quantities of the gems to be purchased
params.nonce: The current nonce for the user. This is represented as a uint256 value, but is actually 2 packed uint128's (queueId + nonce)
params.signature: A signed message specifying tx details

returns._0: True if the purchase is valid

params.buyer: The destination address for the purchased Catalysts and Gems and the address that will pay for the purchase; if not metaTx then buyer must be equal to msg.sender
params.message: A message containing information about the Catalysts and Gems to be purchased
params.signature: A signed message specifying tx details

params.buyer: The destination address for the purchased Catalysts and Gems and the address that will pay for the purchase; if not metaTx then buyer must be equal to msg.sender
params.message: A message containing information about the Catalysts and Gems to be purchased
params.signature: A signed message specifying tx details

params.buyer: The destination address for the purchased Catalysts and Gems and the address that will pay for the purchase; if not metaTx then buyer must be equal to msg.sender
params.message: A message containing information about the Catalysts and Gems to be purchased
params.signature: A signed message specifying tx details

setMetaTransactionProcessor(address,bool.details: Enable or disable the ability of `metaTransactionProcessor` to perform meta-tx (metaTransactionProcessor rights).

params.enabled: set whether the metaTransactionProcessor is enabled or disabled.
params.metaTransactionProcessor: address that will be given/removed metaTransactionProcessor rights.

params.gemPrice: New price for gems that will take effect after a delay period
params.prices: Array of new prices that will take effect after a delay period

params.newWallet: Address of the new receiving wallet

setSANDEnabled(bool).details: Enable / disable the specific SAND payment for StarterPacks

params.newSigningWallet: The new address of the signing wallet

params.catalystIds: The IDs of the catalysts to be transferred
params.gemIds: The IDs of the gems to be transferred
params.to: The destination address for the purchased Catalysts and Gems

devdoc.title: StarterPack contract that supports SAND, DAI and ETH as payment

getEtherAmountWithSAND(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of ETH for a specific amount of SAND

getNonceByBuyer(address,uint128).notice: Function to get the nonce for a given address and queue ID

getSigningWallet().notice: Get the wallet authorized for signing purchase-messages.

isDAIEnabled().notice: Return whether DAI payments are enabled

isETHEnabled().notice: Return whether ETH payments are enabled

isPurchaseValid(address,uint256[],uint25.notice: Check if a purchase message is valid

isSANDEnabled().notice: Return whether SAND payments are enabled

setDAIEnabled(bool).notice: Enable / disable DAI payment for StarterPacks

setETHEnabled(bool).notice: Enable / disable ETH payment for StarterPacks

setPrices(uint256[],uint256).notice: Enables admin to change the prices of the StarterPack bundles

setReceivingWallet(address).notice: Set the wallet receiving the proceeds

withdrawAll(address,uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Enables admin to withdraw all remaining tokens

userdoc.notice: This contract manages the purchase and distribution of StarterPacks (bundles of Catalysts and Gems)
